# Documentation Shortcuts

A collection of references to GitHub Actions Documentation:

- [GitHub Actions Metadata Syntax](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/creating-actions/metadata-syntax-for-github-actions)
- [GitHub Actions Workflow Commands](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/learn-github-actions/workflow-commands-for-github-actions)
- [Create Composite Actions](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/creating-actions/creating-a-composite-action)
- [Create Javascript Action](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/creating-actions/creating-a-javascript-action)
- [Create Docker Container Action](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/creating-actions/creating-a-docker-container-action)
